SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into factory (gmt_create, gmt_modified, serial_number, product_name, product_model, picking_number, batch_number, batch_code, produce_code, product_version, software_version, structure_version, electronic_version, algorithm_version, liquid_version, industrial_control_module, sampling_module, microscopic_examination_module, gold_standard_module, light_board, traits_board, control_board, motor_driver_board, drop_sensor, camera, computer, monitor, microscope, remarks, time) values (#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pickingNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{produceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{softwareVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{structureVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{electronicVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{algorithmVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liquidVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industrialControlModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{samplingModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{microscopicExaminationModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goldStandardModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lightBoard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{traitsBoard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{controlBoard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{motorDriverBoard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dropSensor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{camera,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{computer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monitor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{microscope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update factory set gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_model = #{productModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picking_number = #{pickingNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, batch_number = #{batchNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, batch_code = #{batchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, produce_code = #{produceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_version = #{productVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, software_version = #{softwareVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, structure_version = #{structureVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, electronic_version = #{electronicVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, algorithm_version = #{algorithmVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, liquid_version = #{liquidVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industrial_control_module = #{industrialControlModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sampling_module = #{samplingModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, microscopic_examination_module = #{microscopicExaminationModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gold_standard_module = #{goldStandardModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, light_board = #{lightBoard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, traits_board = #{traitsBoard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, control_board = #{controlBoard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, motor_driver_board = #{motorDriverBoard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drop_sensor = #{dropSensor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, camera = #{camera,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, computer = #{computer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, monitor = #{monitor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, microscope = #{microscope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, serial_number, product_name, product_model, picking_number, batch_number, batch_code, produce_code, product_version, software_version, structure_version, electronic_version, algorithm_version, liquid_version, industrial_control_module, sampling_module, microscopic_examination_module, gold_standard_module, light_board, traits_board, control_board, motor_driver_board, drop_sensor, camera, computer, monitor, microscope, remarks, time from factory where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, serial_number, product_name, product_model, picking_number, batch_number, batch_code, produce_code, product_version, software_version, structure_version, electronic_version, algorithm_version, liquid_version, industrial_control_module, sampling_module, microscopic_examination_module, gold_standard_module, light_board, traits_board, control_board, motor_driver_board, drop_sensor, camera, computer, monitor, microscope, remarks, time from factory
select * from factory where serial_number like "%"#{searchInfo}"%" order by id desc
